trans-unit.source: Iterates over all child content nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 循环访问当前节点的所有子内容节点。

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: 导航器更改仅在状态<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法已返回`true`。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The node from which you start traversing the child content nodes.
trans-unit.target: 从其开始遍历子内容节点的节点。

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: 导航器更改仅在状态<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法已返回`true`。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator on the next child content node.
trans-unit.target: 将迭代器定位到下一步的子内容节点。

trans-unit.source: If the next next child content node exists, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在下一步的下一个子内容节点，MoveNext 方法会设置<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.Current%2A>属性设置为当前结果导航器; 否则为<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.Current%2A>属性保持不变。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ContentIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the next child content node exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果下一步的子内容节点存在;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
